title: Sarah Bloom Raskin, Biden's Pick for a Top Fed Post, Withdraws; The move comes a day after Sen. Joe Manchin said he couldn't support Ms. Raskin's nomination, citing her views on addressing climate change.
text:
Mr. Biden in January nominated Ms. Raskin to be the Federal Reserve's vice chairwoman of banking supervision, which plays a key role supervising the largest U.S. financial firms including J.P. Morgan Chase & Co., Bank of America Corp. and Citigroup Inc.

(More to Come)

Write to Andrew Ackerman at andrew.ackerman@wsj.com and Ken Thomas at ken.thomas@wsj.com
